review.comment:
Here's an alternative yet honest review from a parent who was trying hard to enroll my child but didn't manage to due to the unresponsive and poor administration of this tuition centre.

(1) The first time I contacted them, they didn't reply back. Only received a response with an apology two months later, where they made the excuse that my message was "accidentally archived". By then my child had already completed tuition with another school.
(2) Some time later I made a payment for the trial course and sent the proof of payment. Waited days, but no acknowledgement nor receipt from them. Only after much coaxing, received receipt almost 2 weeks later. Not even a note of acknowledgement, very unprofessional.
(3) Their website design is terrible. The registration form for some webinar doesn't make sense, it's just a standard form to enroll the student and not for the webinar. The webinar advertisement also didn't indicate it's meant for JC2 students. Then there's that annoying advertisement pop up that appears every time you try to fill up the form, and it forces your form to refresh such that whatever you had filled up turns blank again. So we gave up, and my child is happily enrolled with Learner's Lodge. Same price, but such difference in the service and responsiveness.

I give 2 stars as I believe the tutor may be good (based on our limited trial experience). But doesn't help if their admin doesn't get things done, which really is a waste.
review.review_reply:
Hi thank you for the valuable feedback. In respond to their feedback:

1. I can certainly share your frustration. However, it was indeed true that your message was archived as you had indicated that you will not be enrolling since you have found alternatives. So we have archived your messages. During the holiday it was also the period where manpower is low and the centre is closed for a break as well. In any case, we have placed 2 numbers on our website so you could contact the alternatives.

2. Similarly, your message was archived. Hence there was no way the admin would have noted your message on your payment. In any case, we were still waiting for the rest to make payment prior to the receipt to be sent to everyone together. We generally will respond to parent to provide an acknowledgment as well. Upon your message on facebook, the person in charged has also called you and clairfied immediately.

3. I am glad that you managed to find another tuition centre for your child. However, to clarify that while it was not stated in the webinar the target audience, however the topics that we will be touching on has been stated. While granted that it could have been clearer that it is more suitable for JC2, we do welcome JC1 to join if they feel that its beneficial to them. Afterall, its the strategy to the question solving that we will be sharing. I believe your daughter who have came for the trial should have witnessed it herself as well.

Just like any other tuition centre, there are always rooms for improvement. We are doing our best to improve on our systems to make it better. We certainly value your feedback will do better.

If you need further clarifications, do come by and have a chat with us. We will do what we could to help you to the best of our ability.

review.comment:
Approached Leon late in April 2021 for Physics tuition to my nephew whose result has been poor since JC1.  Only 6-month's and my nephew got a sterling 'A'…grateful for Leon's personal guidance and patience and keeping me informed when he identified issues beyond academic scope.
Positive: Sincere, Attentive and Dedicated

Before signing up for tuition, I was uncertain about concepts and had a lot of trouble answering basic common math and physics questions. However, after signing up for path finder tuition, I gradually grasped the concepts through the lessons and learnt to answer every question, even ones which were less common, through the numerous practices I had during lessons

My child has been with the center since end 2020 and i can see significant improvements in his end of year exam recently. The tuition teacher, Leon has been very patient and nuturing.  I really appreciate his flexibiliity and willingness to assist with questions that my child has from school, etc.  He has also been accommodating with our requests given that we do not stay near the center. Thanks alot and looking forward to more milestones in my child's education with Path Finder!
Mr Leon is very patient in teaching and will always won't hesitate to explain the details vividly.
Mr Leon is a great dedicated tutor. He has been helping my child in Sec 1 Maths and we are very happy with the results.

Me Leon is such a kind-hearted and patient teacher!! I just love and enjoy his teaching very much as it is very clear and he tries to make the lesson fun and entertaining😆😆 I can see that he has a lot of passion in teaching as he puts in soo much effort for his students. Everytime I didn’t understand a question, he would repeat and repeat till I understood the question. Thank you Mr Leon for everything you have done for me❣️☺️

Path Finder Tution has definitely helped me improve in my sciences which is evident from the change in the quality of my work and i owe it to Path Finder. Although i only went here for a year i was able to pick many useful skills  to do better. Mr Leon has a good structure to his lessons, is able to  make the time more efficient and and also answer any questions immediately. He also takes interest  in our well-being outside of the tuition as well such as helping us manage our time during the long holidays.  Mr Sebastian’s lessons are also very interesting and got me more interested in the subject. He is able to answer queries in a way that easier to understand and will ensure we are clear of the things being taught before moving on. His teaching method may be unique yet it caters to your learning needs. Both my tutors offer the best help both in and outside the tuition through WhatsApp. Thank You Path Finder!

Mr Leon has great teaching experience and a very thoughtful teacher who puts a lot of thought into how he presents his material that my daughter till today refers to his quality materials from time to time for  her exams revision. His lessons were engaging, useful and very patient and encouraging with my daughter. He paces the class just right so that my daughter feels challenged enough but not overwhelmed. His lessons engages the student to respond in a fun way and thereby promotes faster learning. He is especially patient and eager to help and that has motivated my daughter to improve tremendously thereby doing well in her exams last year despite the odds of missing a lot in school due to some health issue. And as a parent, I am indeed fortunate to have found his class online and would highly recommend him for his passion and dedication is beyond words.
review.review_reply: Hi Corina. Appreciate for the review. We will continue to do our best to help each student as this is always our belief. Thanks!

review.comment: It is noticed that the tutor (MrLeon) is very professional; patience and focus on each  student.  Class size is not many so can pay more attention. Class work and test are performed after each topic . Noticed that my girl's maths  result is very satisfactory with A1 in her sec 2 . Recommended for this center with no doubt.
review.review_reply: Thank you Mdm for your review. We appreciate it and will continue to do our best to provide a place for everyone to learn.

review.comment: My child has never had a problem with any other subjects in school except for Math. No matter how many practices she did, her grades never really improved. However, when she joined this class, her results started to improve so drastically that she had managed to get an A1 for the first time in the two years of being in secondary school. I really appreciate Mr Leon for going the extra mile for my child.

Mr Leon teaches in a way where it makes the content easier for me to comprehend. His class size is also not too big, which makes it easier for one-on-one teaching. I was able to openly ask my doubts and questions and he always helped me clarify it in a way where I could understand easily. His teaching really helped me improve my grades and gain more confidence and interest in the subjects. Thank you for helping me improve in Phy and Math!

Teachers have patient and put a lot effort to my
Son.He has improved a lot  during his N level and he success to enroll PFP.Thank you.

Mr Leon is an extremely patient and nice teacher who never failed to answer my queries whenever i texted him. He also targets the main points and narrows down selective questions that often tend to appear in the past exam papers which really helped. I really am extremely thankful for Mr Leon for helping me jump 5 grades within only half a year of tuition!

Mr Leon behaves professionally, he is never late and never fails to give all his attention towards his students while in class. Teacher also gives a sense of reality, and his approach to teaching is truly unique. He doesn't only teach, he gives lots of advice and tips on tackling papers.
Mr Leon Lo is a patient and caring teacher who will help us in our school work whenever we need help. I might not have improved without him! Thank you!

Leon is a very professional and patience teacher. He will explain concepts in details which is very important for my daughter to conquer her physics questions. My daughter scored A for her A level. She was not confident at the beginning of JC1. Thks Leon.
She's awarded scholarship with SUTD now.
